tasks.title: Concurency fix
tasks.task: Your goal is to create a simple web page interface that displays a list of articles. The page should use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (or any front-end framework if you are familiar with one). This project does not require a server; you can store article data in a JSON file.

tasks.title: Page load optimization
tasks.task: The assessment will consider aspects such as code quality, responsiveness, user interface design, and overall functionality. The task can be adjusted based on the candidate's level of experience.
